sentences.sContent: The manufacturers say that there is no danger of the aluminium leaching into the water.
sentences.sCn: 生产厂家说不会有铝渗入水中的危险。

words.tran: [矿业][冶] 浸出（leach的ing形式）；[土壤] 淋洗；滤取；滤去

trans.tranOther: if a substance leaches or is leached from a larger mass such as the soil, it is removed from it by water passing through the larger mass
